Curriculum Vitae Sandip Dongare 
Sandip Subhash Dongare 
Mobile: +1 919-717-6787 
Email:  sandipdongare117@gmail.com 
  
Experience Summary 
• Having around 10 Years of experience in Information Technology as a Software Developer 
mainly in Facets Development and Facets Configuration. 
• Presently associated with Cognizant Technology Solutions as a Product Specialist Technical 
Associate managing implementation and Delivery of Facets custom development System 
Integration (SI) Project. 
• Currently Playing a vital role of onshore coordinator to gather, analyze the requirement, to 
design the technical and functional solution, development, and implementation of the 
solutions. Interacts with business and client users for requirement analysis, solution 
implementation, to troubleshoot the issues occurred in real-time execution. 
• As part of assignment I have been involved in all solution delivery phases like requirement

implementation, to troubleshoot the issues occurred in real-time execution. 
• As part of assignment I have been involved in all solution delivery phases like requirement 
Analysis, Design, Development, Application maintenance, code review, deployment, unit 
testing and Production Support. 
• Having strong knowledge of programming in C#, ADO, Microsoft SQL Server on project 
development and solutions.  
• Initially worked on Facets Configuration mainly Benefit Configuration (Plan\Product 
Configuration), Provider Agreement Configuration, Medical\Hospital Claim Processing, 
Member-Subscriber, and other configurations.  
• Later from 2015 working on Facets Custom Development (SI- System Integration) which 
provides technical solution around the core Facets Application, includes Facets Custom 
Extension Development, Custom Batch development. 
• Part of Custom development worked on solutioning & developing the Custom Group and

Extension Development, Custom Batch development. 
• Part of Custom development worked on solutioning & developing the Custom Group and 
Member Enrollment (834 Transactions) Process, Custom Vendor Extract, 837 (Claims 
Processing) Transactions, Custom Claim scrub processing, Billing, Customer Service 
Application, Development of MQ based Control & Balance Framework. 
• Apart from Facets Application having hands on experience of other TriZetto-Cognizant 
products like VBB (Value Based Benefit), FET – Facets Enrollment Toolkit, MEET – Membership 
Enrollment Tool, TDG- Test Data Generator. 
• Have been worked on batch workflow/cycle like Member Enrollment through MMS0, 834 
Transaction, CLMU, CKMM, CLSF, ITCF, XPF etc. 
• Having expertise to deal with Facets data modeling, various modules in Facest like 
“Member\Subscriber”, “Medical Plan”, “Claim Processing”, “Provider”, Billing, “networX” and 
Claim Batch Cycle.

• Having expertise to deal with Facets data modeling, various modules in Facest like 
“Member\Subscriber”, “Medical Plan”, “Claim Processing”, “Provider”, Billing, “networX” and 
Claim Batch Cycle. 
• Certified in Facets Business Medical Associate and Facets Technical Associate Certification 
approved by Trizetto. 
• Exploring IBM MQ (Message Queue) work skills and related technology. 
• Proven abilities in requirement feasibility analysis, Coding, Unit Testing, and ensuring 
implementation and delivery as per agreed deadline.

Curriculum Vitae Sandip Dongare 
Project 
Description 
Topaz Shared Services is a Engagement between Cognizant and Blue Cross Blue 
Shield OF North Carolina to Provide the healthcare solutions and services to run 
the clients business in various line of business such as Claim Processing, Billing, 
Premium Processing, group & member enrollment etc. Development of custom 
interface, extension to ease the custom business. 
Role & 
Responsibility 
• Playing a role of onshore coordinator & getting involved in requirement 
analysis, interacting with Client, Designing and Translating the requirements 
in IT solutions and supporting the developed applications. 
• Working on Provider Enrollment Redesign to optimize the provider 
enrollment process to reduce enrollment fallouts which impacts on claims 
processing.  
• Worked on implementing the custom solution to handle member billing and 
payment due to COVID-19 CMS guidelines.

processing.  
• Worked on implementing the custom solution to handle member billing and 
payment due to COVID-19 CMS guidelines. 
• Worked as part of Member Enrollment Redesigns for Individual, Large Group 
standard spreadsheet (DOI), Student Group Enrollments also dealt with 
complete member enrollment 834 transactions and MEET (Member 
Enrollment Toolkit) operations. 
• Worked on VBB- Value Based Benefit for Diabetics Supplies implementation 
for Care Radius Members.  
• Implemented TDG – Test Data Generator Application, which migrates claim 
data from one environment to another.  
• Worked on ITS claim jobs stream for enhancing the job to job balancing and 
system to system balancing by using MQ based real time communication. 
• Good in database, Developing the Stored procedures, and table structure & 
other DB components to handle the interfaces data flow. 
• Developed the custom interfaces for different solution like finance custom

other DB components to handle the interfaces data flow. 
• Developed the custom interfaces for different solution like finance custom 
interfaces for members premium processing through the credit card and 
bank payment, premium refund, custom web services which interact with 
third party application and Facets to get and change the billing mode i.e 
Electronic or non-electronic (paper billing). 
• Worked on Facets multiple Upgrades (e.g 5.2 R2, 5.2 R3, 5.2 R4 etc) and 
Remediation, impact analysis and successfully upgraded the components. 
• Core part of SWAT performance tuning team to analyze the long running 
application, solutions in PROD and tuned various deadlocked components 
like SP, C#. 
• Actively participating the value Innovation programs and developing the 
tools to accelerate the project activity and reduce manual efforts.

Assignment #4 
Title ITS Control and Balance 
Duration March 2017- March 2018

for data transmission and data received. 
• Developed the plugins to re-trigger the MQ message.

Duration Jan 2016- May 2016 
Roles and

• As a part of SWAT performance tuning analyzed the long running jobs in

Assignment #5 
Title SWAT Performance Tuning 
Duration Jan 2016- May 2016 
Roles and 
Responsibilities 
• As a part of SWAT performance tuning analyzed the long running jobs in 
PROD and optimized the performance by 70-80%. 
• Streamlined the job/ flow, deadlock issues which was causing delay in job 
completion and delay in scheduled run. 
• Optimized the stored procedures, execution by optimizing the indexing on 
tables, removing incorrect joins, redundant code.

Project Description The project scope was to provide the health care service with respect to plan 
product configuration for different market line of business as HMO, (Health 
Maintained Organization), PPO, SNP Plans also configuring the agreements 
between payer and provider in order to take the service to capitation and 
non-capitation platform. 
Roles and 
Responsibilities 
• Worked as a Facets Configuration expert to configure the HMO, PPO, SNP 
and Medicare advantage plans with set of benefits. 
• Agreement testing for HMO, PPO, SNP and non-contracted agreements. 
• Deal with medical plans modules mainly service payment prefix, service 
definition, service rules, supplemental procedures\revenue conversion 
and network sets tables.

• Deal with medical plans modules mainly service payment prefix, service 
definition, service rules, supplemental procedures\revenue conversion 
and network sets tables.

conversion qualifier group & proc/rev conversion rule application support, 
capitation, claim processing, medical plan, NetworX, provider and 
subscriber/member and member enrollment modules in Facets 4.81. 
• Having good knowledge in US healthcare Industry. 
• Involved in Training and inducting new member sharing the knowledge 
with team and involve in value innovation. 
• Also played developer role for Benefit Matrix Generation Tool.
